name: milkspy
description:
Everyone's favorite flavor profile! My take on Unicorn Milk by Cuttwood.. 
                       
Super decadent creams and sweet sugary strawberry. One of my go-to recipes when I don't feel like mixing. 
                                    
I wasn't happy with the Unicorn Milk clones around so I just had to come up with my own. Now, while this isn't a clone, it's the exact same profile so call it what you will. 
                
I mean, you *could* shake and vape, but it's not going to be as amazing as it is after a solid 10-12 days.  Just hide it and wait for the vape-gasm. 
                
I designed this recipe specifically to be steeped so that the creams are nicely homogenized and I wanted the strawberry to last all the way through as a top note, which is quite difficult paired up with those heavier creams but I think I managed by just pure intensity....so please, ENJOY!
::for best experience, wait until it turns a golden amber color...I promise you won't regret it::
author: Kriswk

reviews.text: Nice all day vape, this is my wifes favorite and she is pretty picky.
Nice S&C.  The butterscotch adds an interesting touch.
